title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Photos & Multimedia
body: Photos & Multimedia                         Whitinsville A visit to Whitinsville, and the founding of the Whitin Machine Shop.  Duration:2 minutes, 33 seconds                                Slatersville A brief view of Slatersville, America's first mill village.  Duration:1 minute, 54 seconds                                Hopedale Village A brief view of the village of Hopedale, including its origins as a commune.  Duration:2 minutes, 44 seconds                                Ashton Village A brief look at the village of Ashton, and the role of the Blackstone Canal in its development.  Duration:2 minutes, 24 seconds                                A National Park in the Blackstone Valley This brief video presents a compelling case for the continued presence of a National Park in the Blackstone River Valley.  Duration:12 minutes, 45 seconds                                Winds of Change Winds of Change - a ten minute promotional video of the Corridor Commission's accomplishments in the Blackstone River Valley.  Duration:7 minutes, 1 second                                The Vacant Chair This is a short, five minute video of an authentically performed and re-enacted Civil War era song of mourning.  Duration:2 minutes, 4 seconds               Click here to download episodes of Along the Blackstone, our award-winning public access cable show.
